messages.title: FOR THE RECORD
messages.content: THE TRUTH ABOUT THE CONSERVATIVES IN CHESTER

keyPolicies.policyDescription: They changed the law to allow the government to over-rule local councils who want to stop fracking in local areas because the Tories are desperate for fracking to go ahead.
They took £57 million from our local council and forced an increase in your council tax to compensate - but £1 isn't enough to provide proper services.
They are reorganising the Health Service, which could see the Countess of Chester being closed or merged and moved up the Wirral.

Average wages are no higher than when the Tories came to office in 2010. Now they want to raise National Insurance on the hard working self-employed. Their claim to be the party of working people is nonsense.
The Tories are slashing £6 million from our schools and EVERY SCHOOL IN CHESTER is cutting teachers and increasing class sizes - but Essex, Hampshire, Surrey and Sussex all get extra cash.
They siphoned off your council tax and used it to fund Conservative Party election campaigns at the last General Election.
They are closing the Dale Barracks and moving the troops from our area out of the region, ending Chester's centuries-long link with the British Army.
Since they borrowed more since 2010 than every Labour government ever put together. Plus unemployment in Chester is 227 higher and youth unemployment is 11% in March compared to a year ago.
